CustomField.description: Have you agreed on a closing plan that includes milestones with intermediate dates, leading up to a signature on the closing date?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Have you agreed on a closing plan that includes milestones with intermediate dates, leading up to a signature on the closing date?
CustomField.label: Closing Plan status

value.fullName: We have agreed on closing plan milestones and dates in writing
value.label: We have agreed on closing plan milestones and dates in writing

value.fullName: We have agreed on closing plan milestones and dates verbally
value.label: We have agreed on closing plan milestones and dates verbally

value.fullName: We are discussing the details of a closing plan
value.label: We are discussing the details of a closing plan

value.fullName: We have agreed on a closing date, but not really on milestones to get there
value.label: We have agreed on a closing date, but not really on milestones to get there

value.fullName: We have not discussed a closing plan
value.label: We have not discussed a closing plan
